solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--        public int lastRemaining(int n) {--newline--            boolean left = true;--newline--            int remaining = n;--newline--            int step = 1;--newline--            int head = 1;--newline--            while (remaining > 1) {--newline--                if (left || remaining % 2 ==1) {--newline--                    head = head + step;--newline--                }--newline--                remaining = remaining / 2;--newline--                step = step * 2;--newline--                left = !left;--newline--            }--newline--            return head;--newline--        }--newline--    --newline--}
